landing.title: Sketch 2025
landing.subtitle: Interactive Year-End Review
landing.description: Answer 9 questions, discover your year in review

q1.title: Did you understand yourself better this year?
q1.subtitle: Choose the answer that best fits your state

q3.title: What new habit did you start this year?
q3.subtitle: Type your habit and watch the matching emojis light up
q3.goodHabit: Good habits deserve to be remembered âœ¨
q3.followUpTitle: How long have you kept this habit?

q4.title: Which mental limit did you break?
q4.oldBeliefHint: Enter a limiting belief that held you back
q4.clickToExplode: Click the bomb to explode the wall!
q4.oldBeliefPlaceholder: e.g., I'm not good enough, I can't do it...

q5.title: How has your mindset changed this year?

q6.title: Is your body moving in the direction you want?

q7.title: What's the best thing you did this year?
q7.subtitle: Write 1-3 things, be specific

q8.title: My Energy Reactor
q8.subtitle: Tap activities to see how they affect your energy
q8.dragHint: Tap activities below to add to battery

q9.title: What's the one thing you want to push forward in 2026?
q9.subtitle: Enter your goal and prepare for launch

insights.title: AI Insights
insights.selfFound: You found yourself in 2025 - that's the most precious achievement
insights.selfSearching: You're still exploring yourself - continue this journey in 2026
insights.traveler: You're a doer, measuring the world with your footsteps
insights.habitMaster: "{habit}" has become part of you - {duration} of consistency is remarkable
insights.habitStarter: "{habit}" is a great start - let it take root in 2026
insights.mindsetShift: Becoming more {mindset} inside - that's true growth
insights.bodyProgress: Your body is {body} - keep this awareness
insights.energyHigh: You're an energetic person who knows how to recharge from life
insights.energyLow: Watch your energy - do more things that charge you up
insights.energyBalance: Your energy is well balanced - you understand rhythm
insights.goalCheer: "{goal}" is a great goal - go all in for 2026!

summary.title: Your 2025 in One Sentence
summary.template: This year, you {change}, became {mindset}, charging toward {goal} with {energy}% energy
